questionTitle: Children will work hard if the lessons are ________.
We have agreed ________ the need for firm action.
I walked ________ Piccadilly Circus and then caught a bus.
I'll cook the potatoes if someone will ________ them first.
Can you divide 30 ________ 6, please?
I didn't realize everyone was going to wear formal clothes and I felt ________ in my jeans and jumper.
I intend to leave ________ Paul is ready.
The colours in some of the photos we took two years ago have begun to ________.
The only feature ________ to these two flowers is their preference for sandy soil.
I ________ go now, or I'll be late for the lesson.
Now that he has retired, he lives partly on his pension and partly on the ________ on his post office savings account.
They were delighted ________ to come to the party.
With the breakdown of the latest round of talks, a strike must obviously be ________.
At the end of the winter, the price of winter clothes in the shops usually ________.
This company has always ________ to a strict no-smoking policy.
This is such a boring job to do. It's a real pain in the ________.
The car skidded to a halt after ________ its headlights smashed in the crash.
Try and ________ on the bright side- the worst may never happen!
Companies have to consider the age of the population when they are ________ new staff.
________ through the attic and see if you can find anything for the jumble sale.
